  labels = {["static"]}>

### shouldConvertImpl() {#af6a1350b26889cb5eebc75372ab4d3f5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool shouldConvertImpl (<a href="#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Cst)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the given Cst should be converted into a load of a global variable initialized with Cst.

A constant should be converted if it is likely that the materialization of the constant will be tricky. Thus, we give up on zero or undef values.


<XrefSect
  title="Todo"
  permalink="/docs/api/pages/todo/#_todo000004">
Currently, accept only vector related types. Also we give up on all simple vector type to keep the existing behavior. Otherwise, we should push here all the check of the lowering of BUILD&#95;VECTOR. By giving up, we lose the potential benefit of merging constant via global merge and the fact that the same constant is stored only once with this method (versus, as many function that uses the constant for the regular approach, even for float). Again, the simplest solution would be to promote every constant and rematerialize them when they are actually cheap to create.
</XrefSect>

Definition at line <a href="#l00336">336</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp">AArch64PromoteConstant.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldConvertUse() {#aff43b1c529b1af47195587ca0090f7ec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool shouldConvertUse (<a href="#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42; Cst, <a href="#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Instr, unsigned OpIdx)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the given use (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> + OpIdx) of Cst should be converted into a load of a global variable initialized with Cst.

A use should be converted if it is legal to do so. For instance, it is not legal to turn the mask operand of a shuffle vector into a load of a global variable.

Definition at line <a href="#l00270">270</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp">AArch64PromoteConstant.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file implements the AArch64PromoteConstant pass which promotes constants</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to global variables when this is likely to be more efficient. Currently only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// types related to constant vector (i.e., constant vector, array of constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vectors, constant structure with a constant vector field, etc.) are promoted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to global variables. Constant vectors are likely to be lowered in target</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constant pool during instruction selection already; therefore, the access</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will remain the same (memory load), but the structure types are not split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into different constant pool accesses for each field. A bonus side effect is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that created globals may be merged by the global merge pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This pass may be useful for other targets too.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Promotes interesting constant into global variables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The motivating example is:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// static const uint16&#95;t TableA&#91;32&#93; = &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///   41944, 40330, 38837, 37450, 36158, 34953, 33826, 32768,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///   31776, 30841, 29960, 29128, 28340, 27595, 26887, 26215,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///   25576, 24967, 24386, 23832, 23302, 22796, 22311, 21846,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">///   21400, 20972, 20561, 20165, 19785, 19419, 19066, 18725,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">/// uint8x16x4&#95;t LoadStatic(void) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">///   uint8x16x4&#95;t ret;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret.val&#91;0&#93; = vld1q&#95;u16(TableA +  0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret.val&#91;1&#93; = vld1q&#95;u16(TableA +  8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret.val&#91;2&#93; = vld1q&#95;u16(TableA + 16);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret.val&#91;3&#93; = vld1q&#95;u16(TableA + 24);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">///   return ret;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The constants in this example are folded into the uses. Thus, 4 different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">/// constants are created.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// As their type is vector the cheapest way to create them is to load them</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for the memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Therefore the final assembly final has 4 different loads. With this pass</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">/// enabled, only one load is issued for the constants.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/#a332e5f6f2291c407f086104317716727">AArch64PromoteConstant</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/modulepass/#a723659a08d210f4f566887bda3f9f976">ModulePass</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/promotedconstant"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/promotedconstant">PromotedConstant</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/promotedconstant/#af5057fe4659dae804a6517b5a3cfa707"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/promotedconstant/#af5057fe4659dae804a6517b5a3cfa707">ShouldConvert</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/promotedconstant/#a1aff3b665cce8bf73903e00a6f87e9be"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/promotedconstant/#a1aff3b665cce8bf73903e00a6f87e9be">GV</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/#a4e357c8b7364d5898a8085b69bf2191c"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64promoteconstant-cpp-/aarch64promoteconstant/#a4e357c8b7364d5898a8085b69bf2191c">PromotionCacheTy</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;Constant &#42;, PromotedConstant, 16&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Iterate over the functions and promote the interesting constants into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// global variables with module scope.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Check if the given Cst should be converted into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a load of a global variable initialized with Cst.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A constant should be converted if it is likely that the materialization of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the constant will be tricky. Thus, we give up on zero or undef values.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\todo Currently, accept only vector related types.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Also we give up on all simple vector type to keep the existing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">/// behavior. Otherwise, we should push here all the check of the lowering of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BUILD&#95;VECTOR. By giving up, we lose the potential benefit of merging</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">/// constant via global merge and the fact that the same constant is stored</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="comment">/// only once with this method (versus, as many function that uses the constant</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for the regular approach, even for float).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Again, the simplest solution would be to promote every</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="comment">/// constant and rematerialize them when they are actually cheap to create.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336" lineLink="#af6a1350b26889cb5eebc75372ab4d3f5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#af6a1350b26889cb5eebc75372ab4d3f5">shouldConvertImpl</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;Cst) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;const UndefValue&gt;</a>(Cst))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: In some cases, it may be interesting to promote in memory</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a zero initialized constant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// adrp/add/load sequence or when this sequence can be shared by several</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instances of Cst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ideally, we could promote this into a global and rematerialize the constant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when it was a bad idea.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Cst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#ad97fc23e85a854a19101bf8e861356aa">isZeroValue</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Cst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
